bio.description: Bharath Arappali is a visual designer and Illustrator based in Milan, Italy.
bio.focus:
His focus is at the intersection of visual identity and illustration, with a love for vibrant colors, organic textures, and natural elements.

Currently, he's diving into creative coding aiming to expand the boundaries of visual design.

Outside of work, you can find him playing table tennis, enjoying music, and mindlessly surfing the internet admiring the work of fellow creatives.
